channel.title: Lunar help [Delta] how to use it?
channel.description:
I was wondering if we could use Lunar spell in DeltaScape based. I know you need to complete a quest for it but where you go to change to Lunar after you done it ?
Thanks.

item.title: Lunar help [Delta] how to use it?
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:3, topic:294156”]Which client of DeltaScape allow Lunar ? Because when I pray at Guthix Altar, my client froze and I can’t see Lunar.

HELP.[/quote]

Splicescape client. I used this client and it works fine for me.

Splicescape Client Topic

Read full topic
item.source: Lunar help [Delta] how to use it?

item.title: Lunar help [Delta] how to use it?
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

I got that one down sir.

The object name is:

Altar of Guthix

The object id is:

410

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 10:07:14 pm[/size][hr]EDIT: You just pray at the Altar of Guthix and it changes your spells to lunar.

Read full topic
